title: Multi Languages and Font Management
content:
Hello all,   
   
I searched around before asking this question but couldn't find any answers so I guess I will just ask:   
   
Is there a Font Management program, or extensions for one of th popular ones, that allow the display fonts in numerous languages? I have English, Japanese and Georgian fonts and I can't seem to find an app that will "see" all of them. Font Book is just getting too unweildly...   
   
Thanks for any advice!   
   
R
author: rusyn
